segments.text: Hello , sir . I'm ready for you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , please sit on the chair.How do you want to have your hair cut ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not too long.Cut a little off behind and on both sides , too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK.Now lean back a little and keep still . I'm going to shave your face .
segments.speaker: S1
